original_text: “I consider myself fortunate that it is before you, King Agrippa, I am going to make my defense today against all the accusations of the Jews,
korean_text: 아그립바 왕이여 유대인이 고발하는 모든 일을 오늘 당신 앞에서 변명하게 된 것을 다행히 여기나이다

sentences.original_text: that I am going to make my defense today
sentences.korean_translation: 오늘 제가 변명하게 될 것이라는 점이

sentences.original_text: against all the accusations of the Jews
